competing.title: Competing
competing.description: Assertive and uncooperative. You pursue your own concerns at the other person's expense.

collaborating.title: Collaborating
collaborating.description: Assertive and cooperative. You work with the other person to find a solution that fully satisfies both parties.

compromising.title: Compromising
compromising.description: Moderately assertive and moderately cooperative. You find a middle ground that partially satisfies both parties.

avoiding.title: Avoiding
avoiding.description: Unassertive and uncooperative. You do not pursue your concerns or those of the other person.

accommodating.title: Accommodating
accommodating.description: Unassertive and cooperative. You neglect your own concerns to satisfy the concerns of the other person.

leverage.title: Leverage your strengths:
leverage.description: Your dominant {mode} style can be very effective in appropriate situations. Continue to use it when it serves you well.

flexibility.title: Develop flexibility:
flexibility.description: Consider situations where your less-used modes might be more effective. Expanding your conflict management repertoire will make you a more adaptable leader.

context.title: Context matters:
context.description: No single conflict mode is best in all situations. The most effective leaders can flex between different approaches based on the context, relationship, and importance of the issue.

competing.high: You tend to pursue your own concerns assertively, which can be effective in emergencies or when quick decisions are needed.
competing.moderate: You use competing when necessary, balancing it with other approaches.
competing.low: You rarely use a competing approach, preferring more collaborative or accommodating styles.

collaborating.high: You excel at finding win-win solutions that fully satisfy both parties. This is ideal for complex issues requiring diverse perspectives.
collaborating.moderate: You use collaboration when appropriate, though you may also rely on other conflict modes.
collaborating.low: You may benefit from developing your collaborative skills to find more integrative solutions.

compromising.high: You frequently seek middle-ground solutions, which can be efficient when time is limited or when goals are moderately important.
compromising.moderate: You use compromise as one of several conflict management tools in your repertoire.
compromising.low: You tend to favor other approaches over compromise, which may mean you seek more complete solutions.

avoiding.high: You often postpone or withdraw from conflicts. While useful for trivial issues, overuse may leave important matters unresolved.
avoiding.moderate: You strategically avoid conflicts when appropriate, such as when emotions are high or more information is needed.
avoiding.low: You rarely avoid conflicts, preferring to address issues directly.

accommodating.high: You frequently yield to others' concerns. This builds goodwill but may lead to your needs being overlooked if overused.
accommodating.moderate: You accommodate others when it makes sense, balancing their needs with your own.
accommodating.low: You rarely accommodate others, which may indicate a strong focus on your own goals.

mbti.pageSubtitle: Discover your unique personality type and preferences
mbti.title: Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI)
mbti.description: The MBTI assessment helps you understand your personality preferences across four key dimensions, providing insights into how you interact with the world, process information, make decisions, and organize your life.

howToProceed.title: How to Proceed
howToProceed.step1: Click the button below to access the free 16Personalities test (based on MBTI principles)
howToProceed.step2: Complete the assessment honestly - there are no right or wrong answers
howToProceed.step3: Download your personality profile as a PDF when you receive your results
howToProceed.step4: Return here and upload your PDF to integrate it with your ARISE development plan

factsheetInstructions.title: How to Get Your PDF:
factsheetInstructions.step1: After completing the test on 16Personalities, scroll to the bottom of your results page
factsheetInstructions.step2: Look for the 'Download as PDF' or 'Save as PDF' button
factsheetInstructions.step3: Save the PDF and return here to upload it

conflictManagementStyles.title: The Five Conflict Management Styles
conflictManagementStyles.description: Understanding different approaches to conflict resolution
conflictManagementStyles.fullDescription: Conflict is inevitable in any workplace, but how you handle it makes all the difference. This comprehensive guide explores the five primary conflict management styles: competing, collaborating, compromising, avoiding, and accommodating. Learn when to use each style and how to adapt your approach based on the situation and people involved.

emotionalIntelligence.title: Emotional Intelligence in Leadership
emotionalIntelligence.description: Learn how to develop and apply EQ in your leadership role
emotionalIntelligence.fullDescription: Emotional Intelligence (EQ) is one of the most critical skills for effective leadership. This comprehensive video course explores the four components of EQ: self-awareness, self-management, social awareness, and relationship management. Learn practical strategies to develop your emotional intelligence and apply it in your daily leadership interactions.

effectiveCommunication.title: Effective Communication for Leaders
effectiveCommunication.description: Master the art of clear and inspiring communication
effectiveCommunication.fullDescription: Communication is the foundation of effective leadership. This comprehensive course teaches you how to communicate with clarity, empathy, and impact. Learn to adapt your communication style to different audiences, handle difficult conversations, and inspire action through powerful storytelling.

teamBuilding.title: Team Building Workshop
teamBuilding.description: Interactive session on building high-performing teams
teamBuilding.fullDescription: This interactive workshop is designed to help leaders build and maintain high-performing teams. Through hands-on activities, team assessments, and practical exercises, you'll learn how to foster collaboration, build trust, and create an environment where teams can thrive.

conflictManagementStyles.html:
Introduction

Effective conflict management is a crucial leadership skill. Understanding different conflict management styles helps leaders navigate difficult situations more effectively and create better outcomes for their teams.

The Five Conflict Management Styles

1. Competing (Assertive, Uncooperative)

The competing style involves taking a firm stand and pursuing your own concerns at the expense of others. This style is appropriate when:

  • Quick, decisive action is needed
  • Unpopular decisions must be made
  • Protecting vital interests is required

2. Collaborating (Assertive, Cooperative)

Collaboration involves working together to find a solution that fully satisfies both parties. This style is ideal when:

  • Both sets of concerns are too important to be compromised
  • You need to merge insights from different perspectives
  • You want to gain commitment through consensus

3. Compromising (Moderate Assertiveness, Moderate Cooperativeness)

Compromising involves finding a mutually acceptable solution that partially satisfies both parties. Use this style when:

  • Goals are moderately important
  • Parties of equal power are committed to mutually exclusive goals
  • You need temporary solutions to complex issues

4. Avoiding (Unassertive, Uncooperative)

Avoiding involves withdrawing from or sidestepping the conflict. This style is appropriate when:

  • The issue is trivial or unimportant
  • There's no chance of satisfying your concerns
  • You need to reduce tension or buy time

5. Accommodating (Unassertive, Cooperative)

Accommodating involves neglecting your own concerns to satisfy the concerns of others. This style works well when:

  • The issue is more important to the other party
  • You want to build social credits
  • You're outmatched and losing

Choosing the Right Style

The most effective leaders are flexible and can adapt their conflict management style based on the situation. Consider factors such as:

  • The importance of the issue
  • The relationship with the other party
  • The time available
  • The power dynamics involved

Conclusion

Mastering conflict management requires self-awareness and practice. By understanding these five styles and when to apply them, you can become a more effective leader and create better outcomes for your team.
keyPoints: Five distinct conflict management styles exist
Each style has appropriate situations for use
Effective leaders adapt their style to the context
Collaboration often yields the best long-term results
Self-awareness is key to effective conflict management

emotionalIntelligence.html:
Course Overview

Emotional Intelligence in Leadership is a transformative course designed to help leaders understand and develop their emotional intelligence skills. This course combines theory with practical exercises and real-world examples.

What You'll Learn

Module 1: Understanding Emotional Intelligence

  • The science behind emotional intelligence
  • Why EQ matters more than IQ in leadership
  • The four components of EQ

Module 2: Self-Awareness

  • Recognizing your emotions in real-time
  • Understanding your emotional triggers
  • Assessing your emotional patterns

Module 3: Self-Management

  • Regulating your emotions effectively
  • Staying calm under pressure
  • Managing stress and avoiding burnout

Module 4: Social Awareness

  • Reading the emotional climate of your team
  • Empathy and perspective-taking
  • Recognizing unspoken concerns

Module 5: Relationship Management

  • Influencing others positively
  • Handling difficult conversations
  • Building trust and psychological safety

Key Takeaways

  • EQ can be developed with practice and commitment
  • Emotionally intelligent leaders create better team outcomes
  • Self-awareness is the foundation of all other EQ skills
  • Regular reflection and feedback accelerate EQ development
keyPoints: EQ consists of four core components
Self-awareness is the foundation of EQ
EQ can be developed through practice
Emotionally intelligent leaders drive better results
Regular reflection accelerates EQ growth

effectiveCommunication.html:
Course Introduction

Effective communication is not just about what you say, but how you say it, when you say it, and to whom you say it. This course provides a comprehensive framework for mastering leadership communication.

Core Modules

Module 1: The Fundamentals of Leadership Communication

  • Understanding your communication style
  • The importance of active listening
  • Verbal vs. non-verbal communication

Module 2: Clarity and Conciseness

  • Structuring your message for impact
  • Eliminating jargon and ambiguity
  • Using the right level of detail

Module 3: Adapting to Your Audience

  • Understanding different communication preferences
  • Tailoring your message to the audience
  • Cross-cultural communication considerations

Module 4: Difficult Conversations

  • Preparing for challenging discussions
  • Managing emotions in conversations
  • Finding common ground

Module 5: Inspiring Through Storytelling

  • The power of narrative in leadership
  • Crafting compelling stories
  • Using stories to drive change

Module 6: Feedback and Performance Conversations

  • Giving constructive feedback
  • Receiving feedback gracefully
  • Creating a feedback culture

Practical Exercises

  • Communication style assessment
  • Practice scenarios with feedback
  • Video recording and self-reflection
  • Peer coaching exercises

Resources Included

  • Communication templates and frameworks
  • Self-assessment tools
  • Video examples of effective communication
  • Certificate of completion
keyPoints: Communication is a learnable skill
Adapting to your audience is crucial
Non-verbal communication matters as much as verbal
Storytelling is a powerful leadership tool
Practice and feedback accelerate improvement

teamBuilding.html:
Workshop Overview

This intensive, interactive workshop brings together leadership principles and practical team-building activities. You'll leave with actionable strategies and a deeper understanding of what makes teams successful.

Workshop Agenda

Session 1: Understanding Team Dynamics (45 minutes)

  • Stages of team development (Forming, Storming, Norming, Performing)
  • Identifying your team's current stage
  • Common team challenges and how to address them
  • Interactive activity: Team dynamics assessment

Session 2: Building Trust (45 minutes)

  • The foundation of trust in teams
  • Trust-building exercises
  • Repairing broken trust
  • Interactive activity: Trust walk and debrief

Session 3: Communication and Collaboration (45 minutes)

  • Effective team communication patterns
  • Collaborative problem-solving techniques
  • Managing conflicts within teams
  • Interactive activity: Team challenge exercise

Session 4: Action Planning (45 minutes)

  • Creating a team personal growth plan
  • Setting team goals and metrics
  • Establishing team norms and agreements
  • Interactive activity: Team charter creation

Learning Objectives

  • Understand the stages of team development
  • Learn practical team-building activities
  • Develop skills to build and maintain trust
  • Create an actionable team personal growth plan

Who Should Attend

  • Team leaders and managers
  • Project managers
  • HR professionals
  • Anyone responsible for team performance

What's Included

  • Interactive workshop session
  • Team assessment tools
  • Resource materials and templates
  • Certificate of participation
  • Follow-up support session
keyPoints: Teams go through predictable development stages
Trust is the foundation of high-performing teams
Practical exercises accelerate team development
Regular team-building maintains team cohesion
Action planning ensures continued growth

hero.title: Empowering authentic
hero.subtitle: Discover a holistic approach to leadership development that combines performance, self-awareness, and well-being

buildingLeaders.title: Building leaders
buildingLeaders.description:
Leadership development is not just about skills and competencies. It's about cultivating authentic leaders who understand themselves, inspire others, and create lasting impact.

Our holistic approach combines cutting-edge assessments with personalized insights to help leaders thrive.

fourDimensions.title: Four dimensions,
fourDimensions.subtitle: one unified profile

mbti.title: MBTI
mbti.subtitle: Personality Assessment
mbti.description: Understand your natural preferences and how you interact with the world around you through the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator.

tki.title: TKI
tki.subtitle: Conflict Management
tki.description: Discover your conflict-handling styles and learn how to navigate challenging situations with confidence and effectiveness.

360.subtitle: Peer Leadership
360.description: Gain comprehensive feedback from colleagues, managers, and direct reports to understand your leadership impact from all angles.

wellness.title: WELLNESS
wellness.subtitle: Well-being Assessment
wellness.description: Assess your physical and mental health, work-life balance, and overall wellness to ensure sustainable leadership performance.

fourDimensions.insights: Gain deep insights into your strengths, growth areas, and unique leadership style.

choosePath.title: Choose your path
choosePath.subtitle: Whether you're an individual leader, a coach, or an organization, we have the right solution for you.

individual.title: INDIVIDUAL
individual.description: Perfect for leaders at any level (entry, middle, senior, executive), looking to develop their personal leadership skills and gain deep self-awareness.

coach.title: COACH
coach.description: Designed for professional leadership coaches who guide leaders through their development journey.

business.title: BUSINESS
business.description: Comprehensive solution for organizations committed to developing their leadership talent.

testimonial1.quote: ARISE transformed how I understand my leadership style. The comprehensive assessment gave me insights I never had before.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: The 360° feedback combined with personality assessments provided a complete picture of my strengths and areas for growth.
testimonial2.author: Michael Chen

testimonial3.quote: As a coach, ARISE has become an invaluable tool for helping my clients develop authentic leadership capabilities.
testimonial3.author: Dr. Emily Rodriguez

finalCTA.title: Ready to elevate your leadership?
finalCTA.subtitle: Join the ARISE community of leaders who have discovered their authentic leadership style through ARISE.

footer.description: Empowering authentic leaders through holistic assessment and development.
footer.copyright: © {year} Arise Human Capital. All rights reserved.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text1: ARISE Human Capital ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services.
introduction.text2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

personalInfo.title: 1.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.text: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
Account credentials (username, password)
Profile information (job title, organization, preferences)
Assessment responses and results
Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)

usageInfo.title: 1.2 Usage Information
usageInfo.text: We automatically collect certain information when you use our services:
items: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Usage data (pages visited, time spent, features used)
Cookies and similar tracking technologies

assessmentData.title: 1.3 Assessment Data
assessmentData.text: We collect and store your assessment responses, results, and progress data to provide you with personalized insights and development recommendations.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.text: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your assessments and generate personalized reports
Communicate with you about your account, assessments, and services
Send you updates, newsletters, and marketing communications (with your consent)
Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
Detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

serviceProviders.title: 3.1 Service Providers
serviceProviders.text: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as hosting, analytics, payment processing, and customer support. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information.

businessTransfers.title: 3.2 Business Transfers
businessTransfers.text: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the acquiring entity.

legalRequirements.title: 3.3 Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.text: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests, such as court orders or government investigations.

withYourConsent.title: 3.4 With Your Consent
withYourConsent.text: We may share your information with your explicit consent or at your direction, such as when you choose to share assessment results with coaches or colleagues.

yourRights.title: 4. Your Rights (GDPR Compliance)
yourRights.text: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable laws, you have the following rights:
items: Right to Access: Request a copy of your personal data
Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
Right to Restrict Processing: Limit how we use your data
Right to Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
Right to Object: Object to processing of your data
Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Regular security assessments and updates
Access controls and authentication mechanisms
Employee training on data protection
Secure data centers and infrastructure
dataSecurity.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal data, except where we are required to retain it for legal or legitimate business purposes.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist with marketing efforts. For detailed information about our use of cookies, please see our

childrensPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.text: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.text: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws.

changesToPolicy.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.text1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changesToPolicy.text2: We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text1: By accessing or using the ARISE Human Capital platform ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Service.
acceptance.text2: These Terms apply to all users of the Service, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and contributors of content.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.text: ARISE provides a comprehensive leadership development platform that includes:
items: Personality and behavioral assessments (MBTI, TKI, 360° Feedback, Wellness)
Personalized leadership profiles and insights
Personal growth plans and recommendations
Coaching services and resources
Progress tracking and reporting tools

accountCreation.title: 3.1 Account Creation
accountCreation.text: To access certain features of the Service, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

accountSecurity.title: 3.2 Account Security
accountSecurity.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

accountTermination.title: 3.3 Account Termination
accountTermination.text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these Terms or for any other reason we deem necessary.

permittedUse.title: 4.1 Permitted Use
permittedUse.text: You may use the Service for lawful purposes only. You agree to:
items: Use the Service in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations
Provide accurate and truthful information
Respect the rights of other users
Maintain the security of your account

prohibitedActivities.title: 4.2 Prohibited Activities
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe upon the rights of others
Transmit any harmful code, viruses, or malicious software
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service or related systems
Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
Use the Service for any fraudulent or deceptive purpose
Copy, modify, or create derivative works of the Service
Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code

ourRights.title: 5.1 Our Rights
ourRights.text: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by ARISE Human Capital and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

yourContent.title: 5.2 Your Content
yourContent.text1: You retain ownership of any content you submit to the Service. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and distribute your content solely for the purpose of providing and improving the Service.
yourContent.text2: You represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights to grant this license and that your content does not violate any third-party rights.

assessmentResults.title: 5.3 Assessment Results
assessmentResults.text: Assessment results and reports generated through the Service are your property. However, we may use anonymized and aggregated data for research, analytics, and service improvement purposes.

subscriptionFees.title: 6.1 Subscription Fees
subscriptionFees.text: Some features of the Service may require payment of subscription fees. Fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis and are non-refundable except as required by law.

priceChanges.title: 6.2 Price Changes
priceChanges.text: We reserve the right to change our pricing at any time. We will provide notice of price changes at least 30 days in advance. Continued use of the Service after a price change constitutes acceptance of the new pricing.

refunds.title: 6.3 Refunds
refunds.text: Refunds are provided at our sole discretion and in accordance with applicable law. If you are not satisfied with the Service, please contact us to discuss refund options.

disclaimer.title: 7.1 Disclaimer
disclaimer.text1: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
disclaimer.text2: We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or that defects will be corrected.

limitation.title: 7.2 Limitation of Liability
limitation.text1: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, ARISE HUMAN CAPITAL SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, OR ANY LOSS OF DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES.
limitation.text2: Our total liability for any claims arising from or related to the Service shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.

assessmentResults.title: 7.3 Assessment Results
assessmentResults.text: Assessment results and recommendations are provided for informational and developmental purposes only. They should not be used as the sole basis for employment, promotion, or other personnel decisions. We are not responsible for decisions made based on assessment results.

indemnification.title: 8. Indemnification
indemnification.text: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless ARISE Human Capital and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of or in any way connected with your use of the Service, violation of these Terms, or infringement of any rights of another.

byYou.title: 9.1 Termination by You
byYou.text: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us or using the account deletion feature in your settings.

byUs.title: 9.2 Termination by Us
byUs.text: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

effect.title: 9.3 Effect of Termination
effect.text: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. We may delete your account and data, subject to our data retention policies and legal obligations.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms or the Service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Jurisdiction].

changesToTerms.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.text1: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.
changesToTerms.text2: What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use the Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

severability.title: 12. Severability
severability.text: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms shall otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.

entireAgreement.title: 13. Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.text: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and ARISE Human Capital regarding the use of the Service and supersede all prior agreements and understandings.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies on our platform.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.text1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.
whatAreCookies.text2: Cookies allow a website to recognize your device and store some information about your preferences or past actions. This helps us provide you with a better experience when you browse our platform.

essential.title: 1. Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.
items: Authentication cookies (to keep you logged in)
Session cookies (to maintain your session)
Security cookies (to protect against fraud)
essential.note: These cookies cannot be disabled as they are essential for the Service to function.

analytics.title: 2. Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
items: Google Analytics cookies (to track page views and user behavior)
Performance monitoring cookies (to identify technical issues)
Usage statistics cookies (to improve our services)
analytics.note: These cookies help us improve our website and services by understanding how they are used.

marketing.title: 3. Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.
items: Advertising cookies (to show relevant ads)
Social media cookies (to enable social sharing)
Retargeting cookies (to remind you of our services)
marketing.note: These cookies require your consent and can be managed through your cookie preferences.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.text: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics, deliver advertisements, and provide enhanced functionality.

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.text: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our website. For more information, please visit

paymentProcessors.title: Payment Processors
paymentProcessors.text: When you make a payment, our payment processors may set cookies to process your transaction securely.

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.text: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent.
browserSettings.instructions: Here's how to manage cookies in popular browsers:
items: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
Firefox: Options → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Cookies and website data
Edge: Settings → Privacy, search, and services → Cookies and site permissions

cookiePreferences.title: Cookie Preferences
cookiePreferences.text1: You can manage your cookie preferences directly on our platform through the cookie settings panel, which appears when you first visit our website or can be accessed at any time through your account settings.
cookiePreferences.text2: Note: Disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the Service. Essential cookies cannot be disabled as they are necessary for the Service to function.

optOutLinks.title: Opt-Out Links
optOutLinks.text: You can opt out of certain third-party cookies:

doNotTrack.title: Do Not Track Signals
doNotTrack.text: Some browsers include a "Do Not Track" (DNT) feature that signals to websites you visit that you do not want to have your online activity tracked. Currently, there is no standard for how DNT signals should be interpreted. As a result, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or mechanisms.

updates.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
updates.text1: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
updates.text2: We encourage you to review this Cookie Policy periodically to stay informed about our use of cookies.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle:
ARISE was born in July 2025, out of a desire to give back and help build workplaces where people can thrive, grow and rise to their full potential. Because when people rise, they lift organizations, communities, and the world around them.

The magic of authentic leadership
Authentic leaders are at the core of creating conditions where people thrive. By leading with authenticity and realness, they set the stage for a positive workplace – one where there's joy in the journey of achieving results. When leaders do more than meet targets, they transform businesses into spaces where meaningful progress ripples through their organizations and into their communities and homes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: Empowering leaders worldwide to shape workplaces where humanity and high performance thrive together. By providing comprehensive, science-based assessments and personalized development pathways, we unlock their authentic leadership potential.
mission.text2: We believe that great leadership starts with self-awareness. Through our holistic approach combining personality insights, conflict management skills, 360° feedback, and wellness assessment, we help leaders understand themselves deeply and grow authentically.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text1: A world where every leader reaches their full potential, creating lasting positive impact within their teams, organizations and communities.
vision.text2: We envision a future where leadership development is accessible, personalized, and holistic, grounded in scientific research and real human experience. A future where leaders cultivate not only skills, but deep self-awareness, authentic purpose, and resilience—where well-being is valued as highly as performance, and success is measured by both results and human flourishing.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.text: We believe in genuine leadership that comes from understanding and embracing your true self.

growth.title: Growth
growth.text: We are committed to continuous learning and helping leaders grow throughout their journey.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We leverage cutting-edge science and technology to deliver the best assessment and development tools.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.text: We strive for the highest quality in everything we do, from assessments to customer support.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Leadership Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of leaders who have discovered their authentic leadership style through ARISE.

hero.title: Choose your plan
hero.subtitle: Empower authentic leaders through holistic assessment and development

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate experts dedicated to empowering authentic leaders

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Collaborating with industry leaders to deliver exceptional value

nukleo.name: Nukleo
nukleo.description: Strategic partner in leadership development and organizational design.

unlock.name: Unlock Communications
unlock.description: Partnering in communication strategies and leadership excellence.

advisory.title: Advisory Board
advisory.subtitle: Interested in joining our advisory board and helping share our ARISE mission to empower leaders to rise to their full potential?

gabriela.bio: Gabi has over 25 years of experience in Human Resources—including 15 years in executive leadership—building high-performing cultures, transforming work environments, and enabling organizations to achieve both their strategic objectives and the continuous development of their people.
gabriela.expertise: Human Resources, Organizational Culture, Leadership Development, Wellness Coaching
gabriela.education: Brazilian psychologist from Universidade Estácio de Sá with specialization in Organizational Behavior. Myers-Briggs accreditation. Certifications in Wellness Coaching and Lifestyle Medicine from Harvard Medical School.
gabriela.wellbeing: Raised by the ocean, I've always found balance and energy in being close to the water. Today, I recharge through long walks at our lakeside chalet, swimming, hiking, and joining my four children in various sports.

tamara.bio: Tamara is a strategic commercial leader with a passion for helping organizations unlock the full potential of their people. With over 20 years of senior leadership experience at global companies such as Procter & Gamble, Abbott Nutrition, Sanofi Consumer Healthcare, and Merck Canada, she brings a proven track record of driving growth, transformation, and lasting results.
tamara.expertise: Strategic Leadership, Organizational Design, Marketing, Sales, Change Management, AI-powered Organizations
tamara.education: Bachelor's in HR & Organizational Behavior from McGill (honors). MBA in Marketing from HEC Montreal. Certificate in AI Essentials for Business from Harvard Business School.
tamara.wellbeing: Always striving for balance & wellbeing, I've found my emotional and physical release through Spinning, Kayaking & Tennis and my creative inspiration—and sense of zen—through painting (preferably with friends or with my daughter).

joinUs.title: Join Our Team
joinUs.subtitle: We're always looking for passionate individuals who share our mission of empowering authentic leaders.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Help us empower authentic leaders around the world. We're building the future of leadership development.

competitiveSalary.title: Competitive Salary
competitiveSalary.description: We offer competitive compensation packages with equity options.

healthWellness.title: Health & Wellness
healthWellness.description: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance for you and your family.

flexibleWork.title: Flexible Work

news.title: News & Insights

article1.title: The Future of Leadership Development: Integrating Technology and Human Insight
article1.excerpt: Discover how modern leadership development platforms are combining cutting-edge technology with deep psychological insights to create more effective development programs.
article1.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson
article1.content:
In today's rapidly evolving business landscape, leadership development has become more critical than ever. Organizations are seeking innovative approaches that combine the power of technology with the depth of human psychological understanding.

This article explores how platforms like ARISE are revolutionizing leadership development through integrated assessment tools and personalized insights. By leveraging advanced analytics and comprehensive personality assessments, modern platforms can provide leaders with actionable feedback that goes beyond traditional performance reviews.

The Role of Technology in Leadership Development

Technology has transformed how we approach leadership development. From AI-powered analytics to real-time feedback systems, modern tools enable a more nuanced understanding of leadership styles and potential areas for growth.

Platforms like ARISE integrate multiple assessment methodologies—including MBTI, TKI, and 360-degree feedback—to create a holistic view of leadership capabilities. This comprehensive approach ensures that leaders receive well-rounded insights into their strengths and development opportunities.

Human Insight: The Critical Component

While technology provides the framework, human insight remains the cornerstone of effective leadership development. Understanding the psychological underpinnings of leadership behavior allows for more meaningful and sustainable growth.

The combination of technological sophistication and psychological depth creates a powerful synergy that traditional development programs often lack. Leaders can now access personalized development paths that are both data-driven and human-centered.

article2.title: Understanding Your Leadership Style: A Guide to the MBTI Assessment
article2.excerpt: Learn how the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator can help you understand your natural leadership preferences and how to leverage them for better team collaboration.
article2.author: Michael Chen
article2.content:
The MBTI assessment has been a cornerstone of personality understanding for decades. In leadership contexts, understanding your MBTI type can provide valuable insights into your communication style, decision-making approach, and how you interact with team members.

What is the MBTI?

The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) is a psychological assessment tool that categorizes individuals into 16 distinct personality types based on four key dimensions: Extraversion vs. Introversion, Sensing vs. Intuition, Thinking vs. Feeling, and Judging vs. Perceiving.

Each type offers unique insights into how individuals process information, make decisions, and interact with the world around them. For leaders, this understanding can be transformative.

MBTI and Leadership

Different MBTI types bring distinct strengths to leadership roles. For example, ENTJ types (The Commander) are often natural strategic thinkers, while ENFP types (The Campaigner) excel at inspiring and motivating teams.

Understanding your MBTI type helps you recognize your natural leadership style and identify areas where you might need to adapt or develop complementary skills. This self-awareness is crucial for effective leadership development.

Applying MBTI Insights

Once you understand your MBTI type, you can leverage this knowledge to improve team collaboration, enhance communication, and make more informed decisions. The key is to recognize both your strengths and potential blind spots.

This comprehensive guide walks you through the key aspects of MBTI and how to apply these insights in your leadership journey, helping you become a more authentic and effective leader.

article3.title: Building Resilient Teams: The Role of Conflict Management in Modern Organizations
article3.excerpt: Explore how effective conflict management strategies can transform workplace dynamics and create more resilient, high-performing teams.
article3.author: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
article3.content:
Conflict is inevitable in any organization, but how leaders handle conflict can make the difference between a struggling team and a thriving one. This article delves into the Thomas-Kilmann Conflict Mode Instrument (TKI) and how understanding different conflict-handling styles can help leaders navigate challenging situations more effectively.

Understanding Conflict Styles

The TKI identifies five primary conflict-handling modes: Competing, Collaborating, Compromising, Avoiding, and Accommodating. Each style has its place, and effective leaders know when to use each approach.

Understanding your natural conflict style—and recognizing the styles of your team members—is the first step toward building a conflict-resilient team. This awareness allows for more strategic and effective conflict resolution.

The Impact of Effective Conflict Management

Teams that handle conflict well are more innovative, productive, and engaged. Conflict, when managed properly, can lead to better decision-making, increased creativity, and stronger team bonds.

Leaders who master conflict management create environments where diverse perspectives are valued and where disagreements can be transformed into opportunities for growth and improvement.

Practical Strategies

Learn practical strategies for building conflict-resilient teams, including how to create psychological safety, establish clear communication protocols, and develop a culture that views conflict as a catalyst for positive change rather than a threat.

By implementing these strategies, leaders can transform workplace dynamics and create teams that not only survive conflict but thrive because of it.
